Articles.Content: Does anybody else here play either Warship or Battleship Craft? If so, could you give me a few tips on things such as getting easy money, building submarines, tactics, or anything else? Or you could just show off your designs if you want

I used too, then my phone broke  

Its really just make a ship and grind the level it does decently at until you can upgrade. I recommend the 1 v 1 battles over scenarios. Don't make new ones, just constantly develop your ship. Thats all I remember and/or know... good luck!
I do but I don't play it too often
Haven't play it yet but i should look into it, sounds cool!
